body:
Hey guys! This will be an AMA, except that instead of posting my replies here, I'll be answering them with my voice, and putting them into a video! :D

All you have to do is ask me a question, and I'll mention you in my video along with your question. It should be a lot of fun!

Also, check out my new intro! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WuYo7GUGkuI (You don't have to if you don't want to though ;))

Without further ado... ask away!
body_tagged:

Also, check out my new intro! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WuYo7GUGkuI (You don't have to if you don't want to though ;))

Without further ado... ask away!
title: AMA - 200 Subscriber Special!

replies.body: Would you ever want to do a video together? I always loved playing with you in the clan :P Also, Who is your favorite youtuber?
replies.body_tagged: Would you ever want to do a video together? I always loved playing with you in the clan :P Also, Who is your favorite youtuber?

replies.body: Why are you a croc? Prove that you area croc.    ~Snewcone~
replies.body_tagged: Why are you a croc? Prove that you area croc.    ~Snewcone~

replies.body:
What's your favorite color croc? HAHHAHA
